song.title: The Next Level
song.info:
Lyrics: We want to tell about a better place The most marvelous thing you'll ever face Endless wonders that never cease to amaze Beyond imagination, beyond imagination!
A portal will soon open in the garden It will lead us to our promised haven This is your destiny as women and men Enter the next level, enter the next level
We try to save people from misery Come with us we say to the infinity! But it's no use... they just repeat: I must continue! Must continue!
No one else is yet ready to evolve If we want the bliss... we must go alone! We now say goodbye to all the flesh & bone It was nice to know you! It was nice to know you!
